autumn.lang.compiler.errors

Class ErrorReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • autumn.lang.compiler.errors.ErrorReport

  • public final class ErrorReport
extends java.lang.Object
    An instance of this class is an error-report that describes the failure of a single static check.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ErrorReport(IConstruct node, ErrorCode code, java.lang.String message)
      Constructor.

      This method returns the error-code that indicates the type of static check that failed.
      java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> details()
      This method retrieves the details that have been added to this error-report.
      java.lang.String message()
      This method returns the error-message associated with this error-report.

      This method returns the AST node that failed the static check.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ErrorReport

        public ErrorReport(IConstruct node,
           ErrorCode code,
           java.lang.String message)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        node - is the AST node that failed the compile-time check.
        code - is the error-code that indicates the type of check that failed.
        message - is a meaningful message that describes the error being reported.

    • Method Detail

      • node

        public IConstruct node()
        This method returns the AST node that failed the static check.
        Returns:
        the aforedescribed AST node.

      • code

        public ErrorCode code()
        This method returns the error-code that indicates the type of static check that failed.
        Returns:
        the aforedescribed error-code.

      • message

        public java.lang.String message()
        This method returns the error-message associated with this error-report.
        Returns:
        a meaningful error-message.

      • addDetail

        public void addDetail(java.lang.String key,
             java.lang.String value)
        This method adds an additional detail to this error report.
        Parameters:
        key - describes the type of detail being added.
        value - is the detail itself.

      • details

        public java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> details()
        This method retrieves the details that have been added to this error-report.
        Returns:
        a map that contains the details in the order that they were added to this report.
